website_summaries.verdict: A value product with 2 bags for the price of 1.
pros: Lightweight bags with long shoulder strap that can fit all your snorkel gear plus a rolled-up beach towel without being bulky
The mesh drains well, and the zippered pouch is big enough for sunscreen, glasses, and a wallet
The key clip is a nice addition
cons: The material used on the pockets is not heavy duty

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of these bags. Big enough for snorkel, mask, fins and a rolled up beach towel. Nice zipper pouch on the outside and clip included for car keys. The pouch is big enough to hold money, sunscreen and mask drops. Having two colors is nice to know which is mine at a glance. The shoulder strap works well. Big enough for over the shoulder or to hook over our beach chairs that can be worn like a back pack. Two great bags!
customer_reviews.author: ColoCyn

customer_reviews.title: they are not super great, but they were absolutely fine for our ...
customer_reviews.text: got these for our scuba equipment since our "real" bag is really heavy and we're trying to lighten our weight for the airlines. it came 2 to a package. they are not super great, but they were absolutely fine for our use with mask, fins, snorkel, dive computer, booties, dew rag, etc. that pretty much filled up a bag, so it definitely wont hold BC, reg, wetsuit, stuff like that. but for the price, i'm very happy with that purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MrTed

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for gear
customer_reviews.text: We use these exclusively for snorkeling and are able to fit a folded up wetsuit, flippers, mask and snorkel in there easily. Two great features are the zippered pouch for carrying smaller items and the carry strap for ease of carrying. This bag was exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Strong snorkel mesh bag - great value
customer_reviews.text: These snorkel mesh bags were super strong and worked great on recent trip. Great design with wide opening and strong pouch. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bags held fins, mask and snorkel with extra room if needed. Handy pocket for wallet and will repel splashes. Seems sturdy for the money and has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and cute. But they are not very good for the whole diving gear. In order to put the BCD, I get my fingers scratched a lot. Other than that, they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Hossam Khedr

customer_reviews.title: Will fit 1 set snorkeling gear nicely--fins, mask, ...
customer_reviews.text: Will fit 1 set snorkeling gear nicely--fins, mask, snorkel, MAYBE even a smaller 3/4 wet suit (haven't tried that yet, but I'm going to try). Not a heavy duty bag, but very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and as promised and work fine.
customer_reviews.text: These are to carry and keep organized my 2 daughters’ snorkeling gear. That’s all. Simple mesh bags, seems like they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: BrianM_NJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality for getting two for $25
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality for getting two for $25. Large enough to fit mask, fins, booties, gloves, knife without much wiggle room. Only has one strap and a large pocket on the outside to fit phone, id, keys or knife. Wish is was just slightly bigger so I could fit a towel in there but that's alright.
customer_reviews.author: MegaRaf

customer_reviews.title: Great mesh bag
customer_reviews.text: Great mesh bag. Held our fins, tribord masks, snorkel vest, and towel. the pocket is great for sunscreen, etc. Used for two weeks in Mexico. We were careful with them and they still look great without any rips. i would prefer two straps 'backpack" style, but the one strap worked well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Spiraling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Plenty of room for fins, snorkel, mask, wetsuit, swimsuit and even a towel!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fo a cruise trip
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I expected. They are not high dollar bags but do the job well. I can fit my fins, Tribord Easybreath snorkel mask, inflatable snorkel vest and a towel in each bag no problem. They are made of nylon mesh with a zippered pocket on the front of the bag. It has one shoulder strap for easy carrying.
customer_reviews.author: David Wiggin

customer_reviews.title: With this 2 pack, 2 diff color pockets = Easy to identify whose bag is whose.
customer_reviews.text: Going to use this product for a snorkel day trip - love the size. Plenty of room to pack a towel and all of my snorkel supplies. Bonus zipper pocket in front for all your personals.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The bags worked great. There were plenty of room for snorkel gear and towels. The pocket was great for suntan lotion and keys glasses etc.. The quality appears to be great also. Was also room to bring a book and other little things along.I would highly recommend these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Loding

customer_reviews.title: one bag - perfect;  second bag - hasn't held up as well
customer_reviews.text: We've been overall very happy with these bags and found them very useful. The bag with the blue pocket has held up great, but the pocket on the black bag has completely separated from the mesh. Hoping to exchange the bag with the black pocket? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Baltimore Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough!
customer_reviews.text: Good deal! We travel a lot and these have proven very useful. Holds the fins, mask, snorkel, wet shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Momma Tea

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wish this had 2 straps to carry like a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but still looking for the ultimate snorkeling beach bag
customer_reviews.text: These are okay, but could be just a bit larger. So far they appear to be holding up, but the nylon pockets just have that feel of impending rips.
customer_reviews.author: David Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and convenient for carrying your snorkel gear to and from the beach
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good - exactly what I needed. Came when promised - good service.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Spagnolo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for snorkeling gear!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry and held together without issue on our trip to Aruba.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great size, they were just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores M. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Bag is great
customer_reviews.text: Bag is easy to use, lightweight and has easy to use handle and shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Duane A Nack

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Bags are big enough to easily hold all our gear. We used them daily for 10 days and they still look brand new. Great bags for the price. Would definitely recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Jane H Anton

customer_reviews.title: these are great!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, they will work perfect for holding our snorkel, fins and mask. Way cheaper than purchasing at a dive shop.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Roundy

customer_reviews.title: These are cheaply made, and they lack structure. ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaply made, and they lack structure. I expected them to be sturdier since they're meant to be a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Maddox

product_meta.title: 101SNORKEL 2 Pack Mesh Drawstring Snorkel Bag with 1 Black & 1 Blue Zip Pocket
product_meta.description: 28 inch by 16 inch Black and Blue Zippered 8 inch by 10 inch Pocket Drawstring top Shoulder Strap Perfect for all your Snorkeling Gear
feature_bullets: 1 Black and 1 Blue Zippered 8 inch by 10 inch Pocket
Perfect for all your Snorkeling Gear
